The word itself has become so politically charged that it is almost useless to use , but it’s worth thinking about what we actually mean when we say someone is a conservative . I think we should understand being a conservative as being a person who believes in and seeks to preserve the traditional ways of living of his society . This may be thought of as a kind of instinctive attachment to one’s culture . Conservatives are not necessarily against change , but they tend to distrust radical changes and seek to preserve those things that make up the essence of their culture .
